key.name: window-width
key.description: The width of the main Replay window in pixels

key.name: window-height
key.description: The height of the main Replay window in pixels

key.name: window-maximized
key.summary: Whether main Replay window is maximized
key.description: The maximization state for the main Replay window

key.name: hpaned-position
key.description: The position of the horizontal pane which divides the message tree view from the graph view

key.name: vpaned-position
key.description: The position of the vertical pane which divides the timeline view from the message tree and graph views

key.name: timeline-hpaned-position
key.summary: Position of horizontal pane in timeline view
key.description: The position of the horizontal pane which divides the node list from the main canvas of the timeline view

key.name: timeline-vpaned-position
key.summary: Position of vertical pane in timeline view
key.description: The position of the vertical pane which divides the main canvas of the timeline view from the timeline itself

key.name: absolute-time
key.summary: Whether to display times as absolute or relative to start time
key.description: Whether to display times as absolute or relative to start time

key.name: time-scale
key.description: The time scale to use when showing time values

key.name: label-nodes
key.summary: Always label all nodes in graph view
key.description: Whether the graph view should always draw labels for all nodes

key.name: label-edges
key.summary: Always label all edges in graph view
key.description: Whether the graph view should always draw labels for all edges

key.name: label-messages
key.summary: Label mesasges in the timeline view
key.description: Whether the timeline view should show descriptions for messages

key.name: active-plugins
key.description: The list of currently active plugins

key.name: attract-constant
key.description: Attraction force constant which multiplies the force between connected nodes (should be negative)

key.name: repel-constant
key.description: Repulsion force constant which multiplies the force between all nodes (should be positive)

key.name: central-pull-constant
key.summary: Central pull force constant (should be negative)
key.description: An attractive force constant which acts on all nodes to pull them towards the centre of the graph (should be negative)

key.name: friction-constant
key.description: A friction-like drag constant which acts on all nodes to slow their velocity (should be positive)

key.name: spring-length
key.description: The attractive force between connected nodes is modelled on a spring, and this length defines the point at which the force stops acting as a spring and instead applies as a constant (should be positive)
